name: Formicary
description:
You're a worker ant, so the only thing you can do with your life is work... Right?

Move around with the arrow keys/WASD. In a straight, narrow tunnel you can switch to the ceiling by pressing up.

This is a post-jam version of my game for LDJam 38, based on the theme "A Small World". Click here for the 72-hour jam version.

By @etc_celia

Music: Pim Poy by DL Sounds

Sounds: Click by kwahmah_02, Chack by vitriolix, Step/Tap by RandomationPictures, Crumbling Paper by Bash360

Font: Minecraftia by Andrew Tyler
